items.title: Kohl's shares plunge 15% as retailer gives rough outlook for the year ahead
items.description: Kohl's posted a beat on revenue for the fourth quarter on Tuesday, but issued disappointing guidance for the year ahead.

items.title: Dick's Sporting Goods is latest retailer to forecast rocky 2025 as recession fears swirl
items.description: Dick's Sporting Goods issued weak guidance for 2025 as consumers contend with tariffs, persistent inflation and fears around a potential recession.

items.title: L'Oreal CEO plays down the impact of U.S. tariffs, says he's 'not overly concerned'
items.description: L'Oreal CEO Nicolas Hieronimus said he is "not overly concerned" over the impact of White House tariffs on the company.

items.title: Volkswagen expects revenue to grow in 2025, says it feels 'all-American' as tariffs loom
items.description: The carmaking giant said it expects to see revenue growth in 2025.

items.title: Oracle misses on earnings and issues weak revenue guidance
items.description: Oracle missed analysts' expectations for the third quarter.
